articles.author: Karen Gilchrist
articles.title: European markets open slightly higher as investors look beyond Middle East tensions - CNBC
articles.description: European stocks were slightly higher Wednesday as investors attempted to look beyond escalating tensions in the Middle East.
articles.content: LONDON European stocks were slightly higher Wednesday as investors attempted to look beyond escalating tensions in the Middle East and await fresh employment data out of the region.The pan-European S… [+1837 chars]
